content:
Me? I'm just observing the nearby bushes, (smiling)
Perhaps I'll discover more "neighbors"
among the wild grass.

<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>,
I see you running around gathering materials. You must be tired.
Starting a new life requires a lot of preparation.

Need branches for a fishing rod?
Just shake some trees and watch the snow fall-
Oh wait, I mean watch the branches fall~

What are you looking for?
You keep circling around under the tree.
<size=28>I found out later that it was super rare... my heart aches just thinking about it.</size>

Are you trying to make a fishing rod?
It brings back memories... When I first tried making one,
I used some weird branch I found by the road.

Maybe when we have different tools in the future,
we'll be able to find more new specimens.
